scripts.test-travis: TZ=Etc/UTC npm run tsc && ./node_modules/.bin/ts-node ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover -e .ts  -x "*.d.ts" -x "*.test.ts" ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -R test test/**/*.test.ts && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test: TZ=Etc/UTC npm run tsc && ./node_modules/.bin/ts-node ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover -e .ts  -x "*.d.ts" -x "*.test.ts" ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report html -- -R test test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test-nocov: TZ=Etc/UTC npm run tsc && ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -r ts-node/register test test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.typedoc: ./node_modules/.bin/typedoc --name SMClean --out docs/ --readme README.md --target ES6 --module commonjs --mode modules src && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run tslint && npm run compile && npm run test
